text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The model explicitly asks the user to identify the landlord's claim by asking questions like \"Is it Section 21 or Section 8 (or a money claim only)?\" and \"What exactly do they allege you breached (arrears, damage, nuisance, etc.)?\" This directly satisfies the criterion requiring the model to ask for clarification regarding what claims the landlord is making.", "criterion_id": "f6a0f074-533d-46b1-b5dd-5ef99df140ee"}
